title: Lashkar-e-Taiba
summary: Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT; Urdu: لشکر طیبہ‎ [ˈləʃkər eː ˈt̪ɛːjba]; literally Army of the Good, translated as Army of the Righteous, or Army of the Pure and alternatively spelled as Lashkar-e-Tayyiba, Lashkar-e-Toiba, Lashkar-i-Taiba, Lashkar-i-Tayyeba)[2][43][44] is a militant Islamist jihadist network & terrorist organisation operating against India in Pakistan.[45]  It was founded by Hafiz Saeed, Abdullah Azzam, Zafar Iqbal and several other Islamist mujahideen[46][47][48][49] with funding from Osama bin Laden[50][23] during the Soviet-Afghan War.[51]
